#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
	int t;
	int a[100];
	char str[100001];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",str);
		int ans=100000,num;
		a['R']=a['B']=a['G']=-100000;
		int n=strlen(str);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			a[str[i]]=i;
			num=i-min(a['R'],min(a['B'],a['G']));
			ans=min(ans,num);
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans+1);
	}
	return 0;
}
